data.text: PLEDGE TO THE HEX, THE COALITION,
data.name: PLEDGE TO THE HEX, THE COALITION,

data.text: AND THE SIXTEENTH LEGION
data.name: AND THE SIXTEENTH LEGION

data.text: "I swear to the sixteenth this sacred oath to
data.name: "I swear to the sixteenth this sacred oath to

data.text: the Leaders of the 16th Legion, the Big 6, and
data.name: the Leaders of the 16th Legion, the Big 6, and

data.text: to the people.”
data.name: to the people.”

data.text: “I shall give unconditional obedience, and as a
data.name: “I shall give unconditional obedience, and as a

data.text: brave soldier I shall at all times be prepared
data.name: brave soldier I shall at all times be prepared

data.text: to give my life for this cause.”
data.name: to give my life for this cause.”

data.text: “I declare that I renounce all allegiance and
data.name: “I declare that I renounce all allegiance and

data.text: fidelity to any foreign figure, state, or
data.name: fidelity to any foreign figure, state, or

data.text: sovereignty of whom or which I was a subject of.”
data.name: sovereignty of whom or which I was a subject of.”

data.text: “I will support and defend the 16th against
data.name: “I will support and defend the 16th against

data.text: all enemies, Trump related or foreign.”
data.name: all enemies, Trump related or foreign.”

data.text: “I will bear arms on behalf of the 16th; I will
data.name: “I will bear arms on behalf of the 16th; I will

data.text: perform service in the Armed Forces of the Hex;
data.name: perform service in the Armed Forces of the Hex;

data.text: I will perform work of organizational importance”
data.name: I will perform work of organizational importance”

data.text: “I take this responsibility freely without any
data.name: “I take this responsibility freely without any

data.text: mental reservation or purpose of evasion.
data.name: mental reservation or purpose of evasion.

data.text: Glory to the sixteenth.”
data.name: Glory to the sixteenth.”

data.text: Back
data.name: Back
